package2.sequenceHandling
Class Nucleotide

java.lang.Object
  package2.sequenceHandling.Nucleotide

public class Nucleotide
extends java.lang.Object

This class should only be accessed by SequenceDNA and SequenceTools. Not directly.

Nucleotide

Method Detail

compareNucleotide

public boolean compareNucleotide(byte A,
                                 byte B)
compares nucleotides. Ambigous nucleotide A is expanded and compared to B. E.g.: A='N',B='C' is true, but vice versa is false. Can be used to compare RNA to DNA (U==T).

Parameters:
A -
B -
Returns:

returnInvalidPositions

public int[] returnInvalidPositions(java.lang.String seq)
Returns Invalid Positions of String. USE SequenceTools.invalidPositionsDNA(String) TO DO THIS TASK!

Parameters:
seq -
Returns:

string2bytearray

public byte[] string2bytearray(java.lang.String seq)
Converts String sequence to Byte Array.

Parameters:
seq - Sequence to convert to Byte[]
Returns:
byte for each nucleotide or gap if no valid nucleotide

public byte[] complement(byte[] seq,
                         boolean isRNA)
Returns complement of byteArray

Parameters:
seq -
isRNA - if true complement of A is U, if false complement of A is T

countNucleots

public int[] countNucleots(byte[] seq)
Counts nucleotides in given Byte-Array.

Parameters:
seq -
Returns:
int[17]: counts of nucleotides; Index: Nucleotide-Value (Byte-Value); Value: Occurence of Nucleotide in given Sequence.
